instruction: theorem MT_3 {a b : ℝ} {μ : Measure <| Icc a b} (f_ : ℕ → Icc a b → ℝ) (f : Icc a b → ℝ) (g : ℝ → ℝ) (h₁ : TendstoInMeasure μ f_ atTop f) (h₂ : ∃ M : ℝ, ∀ x : Icc a b, |f x| < M) (h₃ : ContinuousOn g univ) : TendstoInMeasure μ (fun n => g ∘ (f_ n)) atTop (g ∘ f) := by sorry

initialize.expr: theorem MT_3 {a b : ℝ} {μ : Measure <| Icc a b} (f_ : ℕ → Icc a b → ℝ) (f : Icc a b → ℝ) (g : ℝ → ℝ) (h₁ : TendstoInMeasure μ f_ atTop f) (h₂ : ∃ M : ℝ, ∀ x : Icc a b, |f x| < M) (h₃ : ContinuousOn g univ) : TendstoInMeasure μ (fun n => g ∘ (f_ n)) atTop (g ∘ f) := by sorry
